name: RIDGE RACER (2012)
description:
Non-stop, intense racing action featuring highlights from classic Ridge Racers and brand new cars and courses and a challenging World Tour.
Features:
Master the art of drifting in single-player mode, or compete head-to-head with up to 8 players in Wireless Battle Mode.
Race through a wide range of environments including seaside, countryside, mountains and the city.
Choose your ride from 54 new, upgradeable vehicles then take on 24 courses including updated console and arcade classics.
Burn the competition with an instant boost of speed from the Nitrous feature.
Critically acclaimed and one of the highest rated Ridge Racer games ever!
'Ridge Racer on PSP® is a dream come true...'
* (5 Stars) ~ Gamespy
